title: IT Program Specialist
qualified: Thirty one years ago, started from a mere paper-cutting service, PT Graha Kerindo Utama as our  former company decided to produce tissue papers in 1986.

Within a considerably short time frame and the arrival of investors, we started a new business unit focusing entirely on producing jumbo roll to fulfill PT Graha Kerindo Utama requirement and worldwide market demand as well.

In 2003, PT Graha Cemerlang Paper Utama was established, producing basic ingredients of tissue papers.
It is necessary in maintaining quality of our product and punctually of our production.
To become one of leading paper based company in Asia Pacific by producing high quality and innovative products and to become first choice for customers.
We believe that the key of our company’s fast growth lies in our commitment to steadily improve the quality of our product, as well as the methods of technology is used in our production.
With a line of products that are at all items soft and smooth, as well as strong and not rip easily, our products are desired in many countries.
To this day, besides their availability in every part of the nation, we have also expanded our market by exporting our premium products to Australia, Korea, the Middle East, and Africa.

With our state of the art facility, we are able to offer a highly effective One Day Delivery where clients can place orders in the morning that will be ready for delivery in the afternoon of the same day.

We are a fast growing company, have achieved TOP BRAND for 7 (seven) years with our proudly products such as : TESSA, MULTI, DYNASTY, and PEEMO (Baby Diapers). Our tissue products have several types, namely: Facial (is type of tissue paper used for face), Toilet (tissue paper is used in toilets instead of water), Napkin (tissue paper that is used as a napkin at the dinner table), and Towel (tissue paper that is used in the kitchen (kitchen towel) and in the sink (hand towel).
